findIT Digital services directory

All IT students are highly encouraged to submit Pull Requests via GitHub to help improve our services.

findIT

Meta. A portal site for discovering services developed by and for the IT section.

Open service GitHub

mat

A simple site for quickly accessing menus for different food places around campus Johanneberg.

Open service GitHub

eatIT

A simple web system for organizing food orders, such as pizza.

Open service GitHub

bookIT

Booking system for Hubben 2.1, HASen and the Hubben group room.

Open service GitHub

hubbIT

See who is currently in Hubben 2.1 and log your visits for achievements and glory.

Open service GitHub

hueIT

Interface for controlling Philliphs Hue Lights in Hubben 2.1

Open service GitHub

nollkIT

The nollkIT committee website

Open service GitHub

chalmers.it

Current version of chalmers.it, built with WordPress.

Open service GitHub

chalmers.it (beta)

Upcoming version of chalmers.it, built with Rails.

Open service GitHub
